failure.message: Expected no exception to be thrown, but an exception "The term 'Import-StartupExperienceState' is not recognized as a name of a cmdlet, function, script file, or executable program. Check the spelling of the name, or if a path was included, verify that the path is correct and try again." was thrown from /workspaces/AitherZero/aither-core/modules/StartupExperience/tests/StartupExperience.Tests.ps1:129 char:19 + { Import-StartupExperienceState -Path $stateFile } | … + ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~.
